devdoc.author: Andrey Gulitsky

BaksDAOBorrowBelowMinimumPrincipalAmount.details: Thrown when trying to borrow below minimum principal amount.

BaksDAOBorrowZeroAmount().details: Thrown when borrowing a zero amount of stablecoin.

BaksDAOCollateralTokenAlreadyListed(addr.details: Thrown when trying to list collateral token that's already listed.

params.token: The address of the collateral token contract.

BaksDAOCollateralTokenNotListed(address).details: Thrown when trying to unlist collateral token that's not listed.

params.token: The address of the collateral token contract.

BaksDAOCollateralTokenTooLargeDecimals(a.details: Thrown when trying to list collateral token that has too large decimals.

params.token: The address of the collateral token contract.

BaksDAOCollateralTokenZeroDecimals(addre.details: Thrown when trying to list collateral token that has zero decimals.

params.token: The address of the collateral token contract.

BaksDAODepositZeroAmount().details: Thrown when depositing a zero amount of collateral token.

BaksDAOInactiveLoan(uint256).details: Thrown when trying to interact with inactive loan with `id` id.

BaksDAOInitialLoanToValueRatioTooHigh(ad.details: Thrown when trying to set initial loan-to-value ratio that higher than margin call or liquidation ones.

params.initialLoanToValueRatio: The initial loan-to-value ratio that was tried to set.
params.token: The address of the collateral token contract.

BaksDAOLoanIsSubjectToLiquidation(uint25.details: Thrown when trying to interact with loan with `id` id that is subject to liquidation.

BaksDAOLoanNotSubjectToLiquidation(uint2.details: Thrown when trying to liquidate healthy loan with `id` id.

BaksDAONativeCurrencyCollateralNotAllowe.details: Thrown when trying to deposit native currency collateral to the non-wrapped native currency token loan with `id` id.

BaksDAONoNeedToRebalance().details: Thrown when there's no need to rebalance the platform.

BaksDAORepayZeroAmount().details: Thrown when repaying a zero amount of stablecoin.

BaksDAOStabilizationFundOutOfFunds(uint2.details: Thrown when trying to rebalance the platform and there is a shortage of funds to burn.

BaksDAOTokenNotAllowedAsCollateral(addre.details: Thrown when interacting with a token that's not allowed as collateral.

params.token: The address of the collateral token contract.

BaksDAOTokenNotAllowedToBeSalvaged(addre.details: Thrown when trying to salvage one of allowed collateral tokens or stablecoin.

params.token: The address of the token contract.

borrow(address,uint256).details: The caller must have allowed this contract to spend a sufficient amount of collateral tokens to cover initial loan-to-value ratio.

params.amount: The amount of stablecoin to borrow and issue.
params.collateralToken: The address of the collateral token contract.

deposit(uint256,uint256).details: The caller must have allowed this contract to spend `amount` of collateral tokens.

params.amount: The amount of collateral token to deposit.
The amount of stablecoin to repay.

devdoc.title: Core smart contract of BaksDAO platform

borrow(address,uint256).notice: Increases loan's principal on `collateralToken` collateral token and mints `amount` of stablecoin.

borrowInNativeCurrency(uint256).notice: Increases loan's principal on wrapped native currency token and mints stablecoin.

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposits `amount` of collateral token to loan with `id` id.

depositInNativeCurrency(uint256).notice: Deposits wrapped native currency token to loan with `id` id.

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: Decreases principal of loan with `id` id by `amount` of stablecoin.

userdoc.notice: You should use this contract to interact with the BaksDAO platform.Only this contract can issue stablecoins.
